definitions.definition: To divide into or assign to sections or areas.
examples: Please zone off our staging area, a section for each group.

definitions.definition: To define the property use classification of (an area).
examples: This area was zoned for industrial use.

definitions.definition: To enter a daydream state temporarily, for instance as a result of boredom , fatigue , or intoxication ; to doze off .
To assign to a restricted category.
examples: We've zoned each other as friends; we'll never be anything more.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To divide into or assign to sections or areas.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To define the property use classification of (an area).
( intransitive , slang ) To enter a daydream state temporarily, for instance as a result of boredom , fatigue , or intoxication ; to doze off .
To assign to a restricted category.
